author: Nexcell Pride
text:
An intense gameplay :_ハート:
Title in english of this stream: "Hanako-san in the toilet - Finally horror game"
Opening: "Summer Triangle"

Based on a Japanese Legend around the cursed at night schools and educational buildings.

I heard about that legend thanks to one reference at Episode 4 of "Kanon" (Toei Animation Version)

But gameplay scared Rushia for the first half, but later she lost a half of her fear, but she can't end the game... For now.

That quality about being scared and later losing the fears has been seen before in the three streams of "Shadow Corridor" gameplay. :_ちょうちょ:

And Supaachaato Orei Time was epic... A compensation about Yesterday's Youtube Falldown.
About 2 hours or more of that section.
Gachikoi effect is more effective.
Rushia is caring about us... And also we need her :_ハート: :_るんるん:
